trans-unit.source: Represents a list of parameters that are used to query a data source.

Initializes new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext"></xref> class by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.WhereParameters*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.OrderGroupsByParameters*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.OrderByParameters*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.GroupByParameters*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.SelectParameters*>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext.Arguments*> properties.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> clause.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OrderGroupsBy" name="OrderGroupsBy" href=""></xref> clause.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OrderBy" name="OrderBy" href=""></xref> clause.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the <xref uid="langword_csharp_GroupBy" name="GroupBy" href=""></xref> clause.
The parameters collection that the data source uses to create the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Select" name="Select" href=""></xref> command.
The arguments to pass to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the arguments to pass to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext"></xref> class.
The arguments to pass to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a collection of parameters that specify which properties are used to group the retrieved data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create a <xref uid="langword_csharp_GroupBy" name="GroupBy" href=""></xref> clause.
Gets or sets a collection of parameters that specify which fields are used to order the retrieved data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create an <xref uid="langword_csharp_OrderBy" name="OrderBy" href=""></xref> clause.
Gets or set a collection of parameters that specify fields that are used to order grouped data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create an <xref uid="langword_csharp_OrderGroupsBy" name="OrderGroupsBy" href=""></xref> clause.
Gets or sets a collection of parameters that specify the properties and calculated values that are included in the retrieved data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Select" name="Select" href=""></xref> command.
Gets or sets a collection of parameters that specify the conditions that must be true for a record to be included in the retrieved data.
A collection of parameters that the data source uses to create a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Where" name="Where" href=""></xref> clause.
